DOC.brief_summary: Five daily dos canagliflozin ( 300 mg ) administer healthy volunteer . Pharmacodynamic responses canagliflozin assess 2 day 6 day administration first dose canagliflozin . A genome-wide association study ( GWAS ) conduct search genetic variant associate pharmacodynamic response canagliflozin .
DOC.detailed_description: After obtain informed consent , healthy Amish research subject screen eligibility . Immediately obtain blood sample baseline clinical chemistry test will , patient initiate 5 day canagliflozin ( 300 mg ) treatment . Fasting blood sample obtain assess pharmacodynamic response 48 hour 120 hour initiate canagliflozin . The principal pharmacodynamic response include 24 hour urinary excretion glucose , serum chemistry ( phosphorus , FGF23 , 1,25-dihydroxyvitamin D , parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) , glucagon , beta-hydroxybutyrate , acetoacetate , procollagen type I N-terminal peptide ( P1NP ) , beta-CTX ) . Research subject undergo genotyping , genome-wide association study conduct search genetic variant associate pharmacodynamic response canagliflozin .
DOC.criteria: Of Amish descent Age 18 old BMI : 1840 kg/m2 Known allergy canagliflozin History diabetes , random glucose great 200 mg/dL , HbA1c great equal 6.5 % Currently take diuretic , antihypertensive medication uric acid lower medication , medication investigator judge make interpretation result difficult Significant debilitate chronic cardiac , hepatic , pulmonary , renal disease disease investigator judge make interpretation result difficult increase risk participation Seizure disorder Unwilling go vitamin supplement counter medication ( except acetaminophen ) least two week prior first home visit agree avoid medication duration study . Positive urine human chorionic gonadotropin test know pregnancy within 3 month start study Estimated glomerular filtration rate le 60 mL/min Currently breast feed breast feeding within 3 month start study Liver function test great 2 time upper limit normal Hematocrit le 35 % Abnormal thyroid hormone stimulate hormone
